Category_Info_Text: Select a category to which you would like to receive information and design guidelines.

TargetRanking_Info_Text: Select your goals and set the priority between 1 - less relevant and 3 very relevant. In each category you can chose only one target with priority - 3.

Ranking_Page_Info_Text: Select a topic/topics you would like to find out more about.
Thank_You_Heading:
Thank you for using CoDiCo-FiberFox!
We hope that the search results provided, were helpful for you.
Codico_Uses_Heading: Our CoDiCo-FibreFox uses deep-learning algorithms and can learn from your feedback and optimize search results. Please evaluate the content provided to you.
Rating_Heading_1: Provided information was applicable to my situation
Rating_Heading_3: Level of detail was good for understanding
